animeTitle: Dokidoki Oyako Lesson: Oshiete H na Obenkyou
animeDescription: Based on the hentai game by Tinker Bell. Shio Atsushi is a professor who will provide home class to two daughters of different families : Arisa and Maya. But it seems this won`t be only educationnal purpose since the two girls show interest to that man.
animeRelated: ['Dokidoki Oyako Lesson: Oshiete H na Obenkyou']
animeCharacters: ['Sato, Maya', 'Sato, Nami', 'Kumagai, Arisa', 'Kumagai, Aki', 'Ikuta, Atsushi', 'Hitotsuya, Chidori']
